title: Delicious Romance
overview: Liu Jing is a staff of the IT department of a bank. She got fired due to her personal issues of not having a family. Meanwhile, Her mother is always forcing her to join dates so that she may get married as soon as possible. Liu is raised to be a normal kid, but still she got some talent on cooking extraordinary food. Fang Xin is regarded as a good girl throughout her entire life. She is always nice to others and seldom get disagreed. After graduated from a good colleague, she got a nice offer and soon met her boyfriend Ma Zhenyu. They got married and Fang resigned her job in order to please Ma. During the pandemic, Fang accidentally discovered that Ma has been cheating on her for a long time. She got desperate and set her mind to divorce. Xia Meng is always the person on the summit. She has outstanding degrees and is paid very well. She gets bossy all the time that her boyfriend Wang Jichong finds it hard to be borne anymore. Their relationship is on the edge of getting broken. Nervously facing the challenges, the girls must make their choices in order to lead better lives.
